author: Antony Mouse
comment: Looks kinda funky on a round screen, but it does work. But please consider changing the voice command, in English google now always interprets 'wear' as 'where', making it impossible to open apps with 'wear' in the title by voice.
title: Moto 360

author: Anne Uski
comment: Any way to keep the app open on Moto 360 when screen wakes up?
title: App Keeps Closing
